description:
This is for you to remember the days when you felt extremely happy.
This is for you to remember the days when you felt like shit,
Giving up.
Ending yourself.
Beginning something.
Jumping off a building.
Felt like you are on top of the world..
The days you cried to sleep and the days you woke up smiling.
This one is for you to remember.

(I don't know about you but to me 2021 was mostly a shitty year. But almost at the end I found something. The 'thing' that helped me to attach these words here so you can read and look at my paintings. The thing that is build by the people for the people. I'm so happy that i found it; otherwise i would have missed a lot. I would have missed the best people in the planet. I would've missed experiences. I would've missed art.
I would've missed all the beautiful things that is happening around me.)



The deer is a symbol of kindness, grace and good luck.
So wherever you are swimming to,
Wherever you have your eyes on or
Wherever you are reaching your hands to
That is definitely gonna happen this coming year.
I will be trying hard too. Let's do this.
Let's touch the moon!
Let's Fuckin Go!
Happy 2022.


Dimension: 1080×1440
Duration : 12 Seconds
